snippet.title: Official Group Intro Trailer
snippet.description:
Are you ready to meet all the characters?
Let's see them all together in this video!

Groups:
-Leo/Need
-MORE MORE JUMP!
-Vivid BAD SQUAD
-Wonderlands x Showtime
-Nightcord at 25:00

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Play today!
iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1580044138
Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sega.ColorfulStage.en
